item.title: Powershell Scripts Functions Modules Cmdlets Oh My
item.description: PowerShell is unique, but it is also necessary in today’s world. I find that newcomers to the language are sometimes confused or don’t understand the basic layers of PowerShell scripting. You can use PowerShell in different ways, but I have yet to find an all encompassing article that explains the high-level of how to interact with PowerShell in these ways. This post will explain the main advantages and use cases of invoking PowerShell for newcomers to the language.
